testcase.classname: ï¿½ Any browser opens and the "http://automationpractice.com/" page is displayed.
testcase.name: Check the conditions specified in the assessment with the correct parameters
testcase.system-out: Given user is on home page..................................................passed When user is on signup page.................................................passed And user enters vodafoneassesment9993@gmail.com and navigates to create an account.passed And user fills the blanks and register......................................passed Then verify that user is created............................................passed When User selects 'Dresses' > 'Summer Dresses'..............................passed And User adds a product in the basket.......................................passed And User search 'Summer'....................................................passed Then User adds a product to cart............................................passed When User displays 'Cart' > 'Check Out' to verify products and proceeds the check out.passed And User selects address and proceeds to checkout...........................passed And User accepts terms of service and proceeds to checkout..................passed And User selects payment method and completes the order.....................passed Then User controls the order on 'Menu' > 'Order history and details' screen.passed
